to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Ubuntu
body:
Hey,

I have downloaded Ubuntu 6.1 and burnt it to a CD.  I saw someone's 
instructions pertaining to how to start speech with it but they did not 
work when I tried them.  I also tried searching the site for information 
but couldn't find any.  Thanks for any information.

-- 
ace
Network Administrator of
irc.talkingirc.net
http://www.talkingirc.net
